text: Matthew Waterhouse (born 19 December 1961) is an English actor and writer. He is best known for his role as Adric in the BBC science fiction television series Doctor Who from 1980 to 1982. Waterhouse is openly gay. == Other websites == * Category:1961 births Category:English movie actors Category:English novelists Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Gay men Category:LGBT actors Category:English LGBT writers Category:Actors from Hertfordshire Category:Writers from Hertfordshire Category:People from West Sussex Category:Living people
